languages.text: "В мануфакторумах Кьявы Гамма есть резервные когитаторы, обеспечивающие непрерывность цикла производства в случае аварии. Критичность ситуации дозволяет нарушить алгоритмы служения, и я готов санкционировать ритуал, который позволит инфоангелам Омниссии поглотить их вычислительные мощности для борьбы с нечестивыми духами".

"The manufactorums of Kiava Gamma are equipped with backup cogitators to ensure the continuity of production in an emergency. The severity of the situation authorises the disruption of the service algorithms, and I am prepared to sanction a ritual that will allow the data-angels of the Omnissiah to absorb the cogitators' computing power to combat these wicked spirits."
languages.original_text: "В мануфакторумах Кьявы Гамма есть резервные когитаторы, обеспечивающие непрерывность цикла производства в случае аварии. Критичность ситуации дозволяет нарушить алгоритмы служения, и я готов санкционировать ритуал, который позволит инфоангелам Омниссии поглотить их вычислительные мощности для борьбы с нечестивыми духами".

traits.locale_text: "There are backup cogitators located in the Kiava Gamma's manufactories to ensure the continuity of production in case of an accident. The severity of the situation allows to disrupt the service algorithms, and I am prepared to sanction a ritual that will allow the Info-Angels of the Omnissiah to absorb their computing power to combat the wicked spirits."

The severity of the situation allows to disrupt the service algorithms, and I am prepared to sanction a ritual that will allow the Info-Angels of the Omnissiah to absorb their computing power to combat the wicked spirits."

"The manufactorums of Kiava Gamma are equipped with backup cogitators to ensure the continuity of production in an emergency. The severity of the situation authorises the disruption of the service algorithms, and I am prepared to sanction a ritual that will allow the data-angels of the Omnissiah to absorb the cogitators' computing power to combat these wicked spirits."

The severity of the situation would call for disrupting the service algorithms, and I am prepared to sanction a ritual that will allow the data-angels of the Omnissiah to absorb the cogitators' computing power to combat these wicked spirits."

languages.text: “为了紧急情况期间的生产连贯性，基亚瓦伽马星的所有生产车间都配备了备用沉思者。而现在，严峻的形势扰乱了服务算法。我已经准备好批准进行仪式，让欧姆尼塞亚的数据天使吸收备用沉思者的计算能力，用来对抗那些邪恶的分离者。”
languages.original_text: "The manufactorums of Kiava Gamma are equipped with backup cogitators to ensure the continuity of production in an emergency. The severity of the situation authorises the disruption of the service algorithms, and I am prepared to sanction a ritual that will allow the data-angels of the Omnissiah to absorb the cogitators' computing power to combat these wicked spirits."

traits.locale_text: “为了紧急情况期间的生产连贯性，基亚瓦伽马星的所有生产车间都配备了备用沉思者。而现在，严峻的形势扰乱了服务算法。我已经准备好批准进行仪式，让欧姆尼塞亚的数据天使吸收备用沉思者的计算能力，用来对抗那些邪恶的分离者。”
“为了保证事故期间的生产连贯性，基亚瓦伽马星的所有生产车间都配备了备用沉思者。而现在，严峻的形势扰乱了服务算法。我已经准备好批准进行仪式，让欧姆尼塞亚的数据天使吸收备用沉思者的计算能力，用来对抗那些邪恶的分离者。”

languages.text: «Hay cogitadores de reserva en los manufactorums de Kiava Gamma para garantizar la continuidad de la producción en caso de emergencia. La gravedad de la situación justifica la interrupción de los algoritmos de servicio, y estoy preparado para autorizar un ritual que permita a los ángeles de datos del Omnissiah absorber la potencia computacional de los cogitadores para combatir a los espíritus malignos».
languages.original_text: "The manufactorums of Kiava Gamma are equipped with backup cogitators to ensure the continuity of production in an emergency. The severity of the situation authorises the disruption of the service algorithms, and I am prepared to sanction a ritual that will allow the data-angels of the Omnissiah to absorb the cogitators' computing power to combat these wicked spirits."

traits.locale_text: «Hay cogitadores de reserva en los manufactorums de Kiava Gamma para garantizar la continuidad de la producción en caso de emergencia. La gravedad de la situación justifica la interrupción de los algoritmos de servicio, y estoy preparado para autorizar un ritual que permita a los ángeles de datos del Omnissiah absorber la potencia computacional de los cogitadores para combatir a los espíritus malignos».

languages.text: 「キアヴァ・ガンマの聖工場にはバックアップ用の考算機が設置されており、不測の事態が発生しても生産が継続できるようになっています。事態が深刻であれば、サービス・アルゴリズムを中断しないといけません。それに、これらの邪悪な精霊と戦うために、万機神のデータ・エンジェルが考算機の計算能力を吸収できるようにする儀式を許可する備えができています」
languages.original_text: "The manufactorums of Kiava Gamma are equipped with backup cogitators to ensure the continuity of production in an emergency. The severity of the situation authorises the disruption of the service algorithms, and I am prepared to sanction a ritual that will allow the data-angels of the Omnissiah to absorb the cogitators' computing power to combat these wicked spirits."

traits.locale_text: 「キアヴァ・ガンマの聖工場にはバックアップ用の考算機が設置されており、不測の事態が発生しても生産が継続できるようになっています。事態が深刻であれば、サービス・アルゴリズムを中断しないといけません。それに、これらの邪悪な精霊と戦うために、万機神のデータ・エンジェルが考算機の計算能力を吸収できるようにする儀式を許可する備えができています」
「キアヴァ・ガンマの聖工場にはバックアップ用の考算機が設置されており、不測の事態が発生しても生産が継続できるようになっています。事態が深刻であれば、サービス・アルゴリズムを中断しないといけません。それに、これらの邪悪な精霊と戦うために、万機神のデータ・エンジェルが考算機の計算能力を吸収できるようにする儀式を許可する備えができています」

languages.text: « Les manufactorums de Kiava Gamma abritent des cogitateurs auxiliaires qui permettent d'assurer la continuité de la production en cas d'incident. La gravité de la situation justifie l'altération des algorithmes de service, et s'il le faut, j'autoriserai le rituel permettant aux anges numériques de l'Omnimessie d'absorber la puissance de calcul des cogitateurs afin de combattre ces esprits maléfiques. »
languages.original_text: "The manufactorums of Kiava Gamma are equipped with backup cogitators to ensure the continuity of production in an emergency. The severity of the situation authorises the disruption of the service algorithms, and I am prepared to sanction a ritual that will allow the data-angels of the Omnissiah to absorb the cogitators' computing power to combat these wicked spirits."

traits.locale_text: « Les manufactorums de Kiava Gamma abritent des cogitateurs auxiliaires qui permettent d'assurer la continuité de la production en cas d'incident. La gravité de la situation justifie l'altération des algorithmes de service, et s'il le faut, j'autoriserai le rituel permettant aux anges numériques de l'Omnimessie d'absorber la puissance de calcul des cogitateurs afin de combattre ces esprits maléfiques. »

languages.text: "Die Manufactorien von Kiava Gamma sind mit Ersatzcogitatoren ausgerüstet, die in Notfällen die Kontinuität der Produktion gewährleisten sollen. Der Ernst der Lage rechtfertigt eine Unterbrechung der Dienstalgorithmen, und ich bin bereit, ein Ritual zu sanktionieren, durch welches die Datenengel des Omnissiah die Rechenkraft der Cogitatoren absorbieren, um diese bösen Geister zu bekämpfen."
languages.original_text: "The manufactorums of Kiava Gamma are equipped with backup cogitators to ensure the continuity of production in an emergency. The severity of the situation authorises the disruption of the service algorithms, and I am prepared to sanction a ritual that will allow the data-angels of the Omnissiah to absorb the cogitators' computing power to combat these wicked spirits."

traits.locale_text: "Die Manufactorien von Kiava Gamma sind mit Ersatzcogitatoren ausgerüstet, die in Notfällen die Kontinuität der Produktion gewährleisten sollen. Der Ernst der Lage rechtfertigt eine Unterbrechung der Dienstalgorithmen, und ich bin bereit, ein Ritual zu sanktionieren, durch welches die Datenengel des Omnissiah die Rechenkraft der Cogitatoren absorbieren, um diese bösen Geister zu bekämpfen."

"In den Manufactorien von Kiava Gamma gibt es Reserve-Cogitatoren, um sicherzustellen, dass die Produktion im Falle eines Unfalls fortgeführt werden kann. Der Ernst der Lage rechtfertigt eine Unterbrechung der Dienstalgorithmen, und ich bin bereit, ein Ritual zu sanktionieren, durch welches die Datenengel des Omnissiah die Rechenkraft der Cogitatoren absorbieren, um diese bösen Geister zu bekämpfen."

languages.text: "Kiava Gama'nın manufaktorumlarında acil durumlarda üretimin sürdürülebilmesi için yerleştirilmiş kavramsayarlar mevcut. Durumun vahameti, hizmet algoritmalarının bozulmasını gerektiriyor. Hermesih'in veri meleklerine kavramsayarların işlem gücünden faydalanma ve bu meşum ruhlarla savaşma imkânını tanıyacak bir ayine onay verebilirim."
languages.original_text: "The manufactorums of Kiava Gamma are equipped with backup cogitators to ensure the continuity of production in an emergency. The severity of the situation authorises the disruption of the service algorithms, and I am prepared to sanction a ritual that will allow the data-angels of the Omnissiah to absorb the cogitators' computing power to combat these wicked spirits."

traits.locale_text: "Kiava Gama'nın manufaktorumlarında acil durumlarda üretimin sürdürülebilmesi için yerleştirilmiş kavramsayarlar mevcut. Durumun vahameti, hizmet algoritmalarının bozulmasını gerektiriyor. Hermesih'in veri meleklerine kavramsayarların işlem gücünden faydalanma ve bu meşum ruhlarla savaşma imkânını tanıyacak bir ayine onay verebilirim."
